name: La Sportiva Genius Rock Shoes - Unisex
description: Hook, scum, and edge with unparalleled sensitivity, power, and confidence. A precise fit and edgeless sole lets you find every crystal on friction-dependent projects and sticky Vibram® XS Grip2 rubber adds smearing potential. Solution-proven P3® technology ensures powerful pulling and edging on steep lines, while the asymmetrical lace-up system provides a precision fit for every foot shape.Unlined uppers and perforated tongues are breathable for muggy rainforest sessions.No-Edge™ technology eliminates traditional edges of the sole, allowing optimal contact and sensitivity between foot and rock.P3® (Permanent Power Platform) ensures a downturned yet flexible shape for steep lines or featureless vert.Pointed toe allows precision on pocketed limestone.Sticky toe rand rubber coverage helps lock-in toe hooks.Thin, 3mm Vibram® XS Grip2 gives precise performance and maximum friction.La Sportiva suggests downsizing 1-1.5 sizes (performance fit) or 0.5-1 sizes (comfort fit) from your street shoe size.
